Summary: very bright mostly white with colored lights off AFB.I know it wasn't our military or of our earth.
divs: Sighting Details MY HUSBAND AND I AT THAT TIME WERE DRIVING HOME AFTER A DAY OF WORK ON THE BASE WHEN WE NOTION THIS OBJECT LOW IN THE SKY OFF THE DRIVER'S SIDE. IT CIGAR SHAPED VERY BRIGHT. WE WANTED TO GET A CLOSER LOOK AT IT BUT I DON'T REMEMBER DOING THAT. I ONLY REMEBER I WAS BACK AT OUR APARTMENT. IT WAS VERY STRANGE AND I BLOCKED IT OUT OF MY MEMORY FOR YEARS. MY HUSBAND AND I NEVER TALKED ABOUT IT. I HAVE TOLD FAMILY AND MY SECOND HUSBAND ABOUT IT BUT I DON'T THINK THEY BELIEVE ME. I WISH I COULD RECALL MORE. SINCERELY CHRISTINE A. YOUNGER
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Edwards AFB
There were no other sightings in Edwards AFB on or around January 10th 1981
